This file is for testing opening positionlists.  This first document
is pure fluff, which will be ignored.  The next one will contain sponges
in strategic positions.

Sponge sponge sponge!  What sponge?  Why, my sponge.  Can you guess the
sponge pattern yet?  Yes, this very clever soft sponge likes
Fibonacci numbers.  What a good kitchen implement this yellow and green
sponge is.
